subject_line: Your Tampa Dental Implants - Your Premier Local Dentist for ... site is leaking calls — mobile LCP analysis
message_body:
Hi Tampa,

Saw your implant ads — smart geo-targeting for your area.

Performance issue: Field INP 350 ms (p75). Heavy images + no form feedback = user frustration on mobile.

2-week scope:
• Media compression strategy
• Form validation + progress feedback  
• A/B test: credentials vs. case studies above fold

Acceptance: CWV within Google thresholds + experiment readout in GA4
ROI: Typical 10-25% CVR lift on consultation forms

24h audit (USD 250 → credited): https://calendly.com/arco-audit
Proof + fix plan: https://evidence.arco.dev/dental-implants-tampa-fl.com_LCP_HIGH_20250809_040014.pdf

Alex
follow_up_sequence: T+2: Dental practice mobile conversion case study
T+5: Implant consultation booking optimization insights
T+10: Last check-in with limited-time audit offer
